text: The Golden Gate Championship was a golf tournament on the PGA Tour that was played in September 1959 at San Francisco's storied Harding Park Golf Club. The event was won by Mason Rudolph, a 25-year-old Tennessean by two strokes over Dow Finsterwald and Bob Goalby. It was his first victory on the PGA Tour. ==Winner== *1959 Mason Rudolph ==References== Category:Former PGA Tour events Category:Golf in California
title: Golden Gate Championship
